fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Use each of your eight tentacles at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Each tentacle targets individually.
- Using one tentacle on someone will use a (54) Tracker ability on them.
- Using two tentacles on someone will roleblock them.
- Using three tentacles on someone will blackmail them.
- Using four tentacles on someone will redirect them to a player of your choice.
- Using six tentacles on someone will deal a Powerful attack to them.
- Using eight tentacles on someone will deal a Powerful attack to them *and* prevent anyone from visiting your target.
- Using two tentacles on yourself will grant yourself Powerful defense and Roleblock immunity this night.
- Redirect immune
- Anyone who refers to this role as an octopus gets the Banned role.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill anyone who would oppose you.
